name: Olio essenziale folgorante
desc:
Grants greater affinity for Electro, boosting Electro DMG.
It induces a tingling sensation on the skin and renders the user better able to better channel Electro energy â€” but comes with a risk of causing an electrical fire that would definitely ruin your perfect hair.

value.text: Increases all party members' Electro DMG by 25% for 300s.
